snippet: A tanker containing vinyl chloride was sliced open in the accident, and 71 people were treated at a hospital.
abstract: Freight train derails on a railroad bridge in Paulsboro, NJ, partly toppling tanker cars into a creek and causing a leak of hazardous gas that is blamed for sickening dozens of area residents.
lead_paragraph: A tanker containing vinyl chloride was sliced open in the accident, and 71 people were treated at a hospital.

headline.seo: Freight Train Derailment in New Jersey Causes Leak of Hazardous Gas
headline.main: Hazardous Fumes Leak After Derailment in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Hazardous Fumes Leak After Derailment in New Jersey
